description: Try our easy to follow Plum, Cherry & Custard Pavlova recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Plum, Cherry & Custard Pavlova Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 plums, destoned, cut into wedges (or nectarines, peaches, apricots)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 120Â°C. Draw a 22cm circle on 2 sheets of baking paper. Arrange paper, pencil side down, on 2 baking trays.

Using an electric mixer, whisk egg whites in a large bowl on high speed to firm peaks. Gradually add sugar, 1 tbs at a time, beating well between additions until sugar dissolves. Scrape down sides of bowl and beat for a further 3 minutes or until mixture is thick, stiff and glossy. Mix vinegar and cornflour in a small bowl, then beat into meringue.
Divide mixture between circle templates, using a palette knife to spread to edges. Smooth sides and top, then make a slight indent in the centre of each. Bake for 2 hours or until crisp and dry.
Turn off oven and leave door ajar. Leave meringues in oven to cool. Pit half the cherries, then halve and mix with plums.

Using an electric mixer, beat the cream to stiff peaks. Swirl through custard. Transfer a meringue base to a serving plate. Spread half each of the cream mixture and plum mixture over base. Repeat layering. Top with remaining cherries. Serve immediately.
